plot: In a surreal musical fantasy, a young, bewildered housewife is instructed on how to cook by an enchanted sauce-pot, and the two of them sing the praises of Karo Syrup, which is to be put on everything from ham to asparagus.
title: The Enchanted Pot
plot_es: In a surreal musical fantasy, a young, bewildered housewife is instructed on how to cook by an enchanted sauce-pot, and the two of them sing the praises of Karo Syrup, which is to be put on everything from ham to asparagus.
plot_en: In a surreal musical fantasy, a young, bewildered housewife is instructed on how to cook by an enchanted sauce-pot, and the two of them sing the praises of Karo Syrup, which is to be put on everything from ham to asparagus.
